notesStmt.note: Empty line between XXX 28/29; The folio contains Proverbs XXX 27 מלך - XXXI 9 ואביון.
Condition: damaged, losses in exterior edge.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 9; ruling method: left rule is justified by a mid-line space, not always on etnaḥta.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)
